Articles.Content: I wanted to make a plane that could reach the other KSP. It\'s pretty simple and is modeled after modern airliners. Makes it to the KSP2 with 2 tanks to spare in about 30 minutes cruising at about 12,500 meters. Uses stock parts only. I think it should easily reach the poles. I\'ll have to see how far I could push it.

I need to update my C7 retextures.

About the plane... it looks pretty good.
